title: The Zanzibar Affair: A High Society Love Story Out of Africa
description: A high society love story that spans three continents and is tainted by the mystery disappearance of Kate Hope. Her ex lover from eighteen years earlier, Tom Fletcher, is drawn to Africa to investigate the murder of a woman found dead in a remote part of Africa. He begins to unravel the mystery and intrigue that surrounds Kate, the only woman he has ever really loved, and begins to discover the reasons for her sudden unexplained departure from all those she held dear.
author: Samantha Ford
